channel.title: Pvp Help!
channel.description:
Hello,
Delta 317 Server I coded an pvp server, So you can attack like uhm 10-20 but if your like lvl 10 or something you wont be able to attack 12. So it still is like normal Pk how can i fix this?
Thanks, Soul
PS: sorry for bad english if you dont understand it tell me i will try to explain more clearly ;D

item.title: Pvp Help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

No i mean that your like uhm cb lvl 90,
Then you will be able to attack lvl 80 - 100 but when you want to atk somewane from lvl 92 or 88.
You wont be able its still stuck at the normal wilderness leveling,
but i made it pvp i need to know how to fix it :S.
That is my question i hope you understand what i mean now

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

You would like to have like 125-138, instead of Wilderness levels?

Read full topic
